thread.title: BRIEF-Gogo Inc Qtrly ‍Net Loss Attributable To Common Stock Per Share $0.52​

title: BRIEF-Gogo Inc Qtrly ‍Net Loss Attributable To Common Stock Per Share $0.52​
text: February 22, 2018 / 12:21 PM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-Gogo Inc Qtrly ‍Net Loss Attributable To Common Stock Per Share $0.52​ Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Gogo Inc: * GOGO ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 18 PERCENT TO $188 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $865 MILLION TO $935 MILLION * ‍ FOR YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017, CO RECORDED APPROXIMATELY $3.0 MILLION OF INCOME TAX BENEFITS DUE TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT (“TCJA”)​ * ‍ FOR FULL YEAR ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $75 MILLION TO $100 MILLION​ * ‍ FOR FY ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2018, COMPANY EXPECTS GROSS CAPITAL EXPENDITURES OF $150 MILLION TO $170 MILLION AND CASH CAPEX OF $110 MILLION TO $130 MILLION​ * ‍FREE CASH FLOW IS EXPECTED TO IMPROVE FROM 2017 TO 2018 DRIVEN BY ADJUSTED EBITDA GROWTH AND LOWER CASH CAPEX​ * ‍REAFFIRMS ITS TARGET OF BECOMING FREE CASH FLOW POSITIVE IN 2019 AND FOR FULL YEAR 2020​ * QTRLY ‍NET LOSS ATTRIBUTABLE TO COMMON STOCK PER SHARE $0.52​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.48, REVENUE VIEW $181.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $768.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
